groups.name: dapr.client
groups.description: The container for Dapr Client related configuration options.

properties.name: dapr.client.http_port
properties.description: HTTP port for Dapr after checking system property and environment variable.

properties.name: dapr.client.grpc_port
properties.description: GRPC port for Dapr after checking system property and environment variable.

properties.name: dapr.client.grpc_endpoint
properties.description: GRPC endpoint for remote sidecar connectivity.

properties.name: dapr.client.http_endpoint
properties.description: GRPC endpoint for remote sidecar connectivity.

properties.name: dapr.client.max_retries
properties.description: Maximum number of retries for retriable exceptions.

properties.name: dapr.client.api_protocol
properties.description: Determines if Dapr client will use gRPC or HTTP to talk to Dapr's side car.

properties.name: dapr.client.api_method_invocation_protocol
properties.description: Determines if Dapr client should use gRPC or HTTP for Dapr's service method invocation APIs.

properties.name: dapr.client.api_token
properties.description: API token for authentication between App and Dapr's side car.

properties.name: dapr.client.string_charset
properties.description: Determines which string encoding is used in Dapr's Java SDK.

properties.name: dapr.client.http_client_read_timeout_seconds
properties.description: Dapr's timeout in seconds for HTTP client reads.

properties.name: dapr.client.http_client_max_requests
properties.description: Dapr's default maximum number of requests for HTTP client to execute concurrently.

properties.name: dapr.client.http_client_max_idle_connections
properties.description: Dapr's default maximum number of idle connections for HTTP connection pool.

properties.name: dapr.client.sidecar_connect_wait_millis
properties.description: Dapr's timeout in milliseconds for wait sidecar to be online.

properties.name: dapr.client.sidecar_connect_always_retry
properties.description: Dapr's value for if always wait dapr sidecar to be online.

values.description: Connect to dapr with grpc protocol.
Connect to dapr with http protocol.
Invoke to dapr with grpc protocol.
Invoke to dapr with grpc protocol.
